text: Province of Arezzo (Italian: Provincia di Arezzo) is the eastern most province in the Tuscany region of Italy. The capital of province of Arezzo is the city of Arezzo. The province has an area of 3,232 kmÂ², and a total population of 323,288 (2001) in 39 comuni (singular: comune). Comune Population Arezzo 95,082 Montevarchi 22,800 Cortona 22,537 San Giovanni Valdarno 17,103 Sansepolcro 15,858 Castiglion Fiorentino 12,502 Bibbiena 12,104 Terranuova Bracciolini 11,814 Bucine 9,760 Civitella in Val di Chiana 8,919 Foiano della Chiana 8,795 Cavriglia 8,764 Monte San Savino 8,456 == Other websites == * Province homepage (in Italian)
title: Province of Arezzo
